page.title: 08Recreation at the Hurn.
page.content: Holbeach Hurn is the only village in our block.People have to come here,or one of the other local villages or go to Holbeach or further for recreation. Holbeach Hurn has a large grass playing field with a football pitch.There is a play area for children with a sandpit,swings,a slide and a swingboat.There is a tennis court paid for by a local farmer in 1976 and presented to the village.Two villagers have swimming pools and residents sometimes get to use them.There is a youth club for the over-8s,and Friendship club for over-60s.The membership is never very big because after retirement many people leave the village although there are 6 purpose built old folks bungalows.For any organised groups like Scouts and Guides you have to go out of the area.
